text: Lavɨla 19.6-7 HJL 2.4, 6.6, 8.17, 10.44-46 Polɨ nudɨ human agɨladɨ hulaŋ human limu limu fɨhala hɨcɨ limu ahica cɨjɨŋ agɨladɨ sabɨ hɨvɨ lamalama umi. Lɨdaci Asɨ dɨ Amɨŋ agaŋ mɨgavɨla nɨbɨlaŋ hula hɨnimi. Hɨnidaci ciaŋ sɨbaŋ mu hɨvɨ mu hɨvɨ abavɨhadami. Lɨdɨŋ Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ igalahalaha hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ me hɨnihɨni ciaŋ sulavɨhadami.
